sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics shareholders approve equity plan amendment and board elections
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. shareholders approved an amendment to the company's 2020 Equity Incentive Plan, increasing shares available for issuance by 3,500,000, and prohibiting certain transfers or buyouts without approval. Shareholders also elected three Class III directors—Eric Benhamou, Patrick Nicolet, and Weihang Wang—to serve until the 2028 annual meeting. Additionally, the appointment of Grant Thornton LLP as the independent registered public accounting firm for 2025 was ratified, and the compensation of named executive officers was approved on an advisory basis.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics expands equity plan and confirms board leadership
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings (GDYN) shareholders approved an amendment to the company’s 2020 Equity Incentive Plan, adding 3.5 million shares for future equity awards and tightening governance. They also elected three Class III directors, ratified Grant Thornton LLP as independent auditor, and gave advisory approval to executive compensation. Analysts currently rate GDYN as a Buy with a target of $10.50, and TipRanks' AI Analyst assesses it as Outperform due to strong revenue, strategic AI initiatives, and positive technical indicators.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics shareholders approve equity plan amendment and board elections
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. shareholders recently approved an amendment to the company's 2020 Equity Incentive Plan, increasing available shares by 3,500,000 and modifying terms to prohibit repricing or cash buyouts without approval. Additionally, three Class III directors were elected, Grant Thornton LLP was ratified as the independent accounting firm for 2025, and executive compensation was approved on an advisory basis. These decisions were made at the annual meeting where 91.0% of outstanding common stock was represented.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics expands equity plan and confirms board leadership
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings (GDYN) shareholders approved an amendment to the company’s 2020 Equity Incentive Plan, adding 3.5 million shares for future equity awards and implementing stricter governance. The company also re-elected three Class III directors, ratified its independent auditor, and approved executive compensation. TipRanks’ AI Analyst, Spark, rated GDYN as "Outperform," citing strong revenue and strategic AI initiatives, balanced against high valuation and profitability challenges.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics shareholders approve equity plan amendment and board elections By Investing.com
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings Inc. shareholders approved an amendment to the company's 2020 Equity Incentive Plan, increasing shares available for issuance by 3.5 million and prohibiting certain equity award changes without approval. Shareholders also elected three Class III directors to the board and ratified Grant Thornton LLP as the independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2025. Additionally, shareholders approved, on an advisory basis, the compensation of the company's named executive officers.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics shareholders approve equity plan amendment and board elections
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. shareholders approved an amendment to the company’s 2020 Equity Incentive Plan, increasing available shares by 3,500,000 and restricting certain equity award actions without approval. They also elected three Class III directors—Eric Benhamou, Patrick Nicolet, and Weihang Wang—to serve until the 2028 annual meeting and ratified Grant Thornton LLP as the independent registered public accounting firm. Additionally, shareholders approved the compensation of named executive officers on an advisory basis.

feed.title: Riverbridge Partners LLC Has $15.47 Million Position in Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. $GDYN
feed.summary: Riverbridge Partners LLC reduced its stake in Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. by 11.2% in the third quarter, holding 2,006,806 shares valued at approximately $15.47 million. Despite this, other institutional investors have significantly increased their positions, contributing to 71.18% institutional ownership. Analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with a consensus price target of $11.33 for the company.

feed.title: Squarepoint Ops LLC Takes Position in Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. $GDYN
feed.summary: Squarepoint Ops LLC recently initiated a position in Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:GDYN), acquiring 222,082 shares valued at approximately $2.565 million. Several other institutional investors also increased their stakes, bringing total institutional ownership to about 71.18%. Despite a recent insider sale by CFO Anil Doradla, analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with an average price target of $11.33.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Holdings (NASDAQ:GDYN) Is Experiencing Growth In Returns On Capital
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings (NASDAQ:GDYN) is showing promising growth in its Return on Capital Employed (ROCE), indicating a potential for long-term multiplication. The company has transitioned from being loss-making five years ago to generating a 0.6% return on capital, utilizing 270% more capital during this period. This trend suggests that Grid Dynamics Holdings has profitable reinvestment opportunities, which could lead to significant future performance.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ:GDYN) CFO Anil Doradla Sells 4,368 Shares
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ:GDYN) CFO Anil Doradla sold 4,368 shares of the company's stock on December 9th at an average price of $10.00, reducing his stake by 1.25%. Following the transaction, Doradla directly owns 344,852 shares valued at $3,448,520. The company's stock traded down 2.9% to $9.77, and analysts have a mixed view with a consensus "Hold" rating and a target price of $11.33.

feed.title: Next Century Growth Investors LLC Has $5.64 Million Position in Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. $GDYN
feed.summary: Next Century Growth Investors LLC significantly reduced its stake in Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:GDYN) by 72.9% in the second quarter, now holding 488,114 shares valued at $5.64 million. Despite the institutional sell-off, Grid Dynamics maintains a "Hold" consensus rating from analysts with an average target price of $11.33. The company reported Q2 EPS of $0.09 on revenues of $104.16 million, marking a 19.1% year-over-year increase.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Signs Strategic Collaboration Agreement with AWS to Advance Data Foundations for Generative AI
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics has signed a multi-year Strategic Collaboration Agreement with Amazon Web Services (AWS) to accelerate AI-related services for enterprise customers, focusing on generative AI journeys. This agreement extends their 15-year collaboration and grants Grid Dynamics access to the AWS Data Foundations for Generative AI Program. Through this, Grid Dynamics aims to empower clients at every stage of their AI journey, providing modern, scalable, and secure data foundations from AWS to help enterprises move from AI experimentation to full-scale production.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) joins AWS Data Foundations for Generative AI program
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: GDYN) has signed a multi-year Strategic Collaboration Agreement (SCA) with Amazon Web Services (AWS) to advance data foundations for generative AI. This agreement extends a 15-year relationship and provides Grid Dynamics access to the AWS Data Foundations for Generative AI Program, enabling them to help enterprise customers adopt and scale AI-powered solutions. Grid Dynamics will offer tailored solutions for data strategy, rapid deployment, end-to-end AI solutions, and ongoing optimization services.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics signs strategic collaboration agreement with AWS to advance data foundations for Generative AI
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. has announced a strategic collaboration agreement with Amazon Web Services (AWS) to enhance data foundations for Generative AI. This partnership aims to help enterprises leverage AWS services to build robust data platforms essential for advanced AI applications. The collaboration focuses on improving data management and infrastructure to support generative AI initiatives.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:GDYN) Receives Consensus Recommendation of "Hold" from Brokerages
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:GDYN) has received a consensus "Hold" rating from five brokerages, with an average one-year price target of $11.33. The company recently reported Q3 EPS of $0.09, meeting estimates, and revenue of $104.16 million, marking a 19.1% year-over-year increase. Analyst opinions are varied, with some firms cutting price targets while others maintain buy or hold ratings.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Stock Surges on AI & EV Grid Modernization Demand | Dec 3, 2025 - News and Statistics
feed.summary: Shares of Grid Dynamics (GDYN) surged 10.2% on December 3, 2025, driven by investor optimism surrounding the critical need for grid modernization. This demand is intensified by the rapid growth of AI data centers and electric vehicles, which are placing historic stress on the U.S. power grid. The company's stock closed at $9.49, reflecting an 8.6% increase from its previous close, as green investments flow into clean energy and related sectors to support grid adaptation.

feed.title: Prosper Stars & Stripes Closed Its Short Position in Grid Dynamics Holdings (GDYN) in Q3
feed.summary: Prosper Stars & Stripes, a long/short equity fund, reported a net return of +9.8% in Q3 2025, outperforming its peer group. The fund significantly benefited from its short position in Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. (GDYN), which was closed shortly after the quarter ended due to factors like client spending apprehension and the impact of Generative AI on client demand. GDYN, a technology consulting company, saw its shares decline by 54.39% over 52 weeks, closing at $8.67 per share on November 26, 2025.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Updates Director Compensation Policy
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings (GDYN) announced changes to its Outside Director Compensation Policy, effective December 23, 2025. The company will now pay annual retainer fees for directors in equity (restricted stock units) instead of cash, allowing directors the option to elect cash payments during a specified period. This strategic shift aims to align director compensation with company performance and stakeholder interests. The stock currently holds a "Buy" analyst rating with a $14 price target, and TipRanks' AI Analyst, Spark, rates GDYN as "Outperform" due to its strong financial foundation and growth potential, despite valuation concerns.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Announces $50M Share Repurchase Program
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings announced a $50 million share repurchase program on October 23, 2025, reflecting confidence in its long-term business prospects. The company reported record third-quarter revenues of $104.2 million, driven by strong demand in AI and digital transformation services. An analyst has a Buy rating with a $9.00 price target for GDYN, while TipRanks' AI Analyst, Spark, rates it as Outperform due to strong financials and AI-focused growth, despite bearish technical trends and a high P/E ratio.

feed.title: Bear Of The Day: Grid Dynamics (GDYN)
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics (GDYN) has been designated as the "Bear of the Day" by Zacks Investment Research, receiving a Zacks Rank #5 (Strong Sell). This designation is primarily due to recent negative revisions in its annual earnings estimates for the current and next fiscal years, despite the company having met or beaten earnings expectations in recent quarters. The company provides technology consulting, platform, and product engineering services.

feed.title: Gryzlov Yury, Grid Dynamics COO, sells $6633 in GDYN stock By Investing.com
feed.summary: Yury Gryzlov, COO of Grid Dynamics Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:GDYN), sold 737 shares of common stock for $6,633 on October 31, 2025. This transaction was executed under a Rule 10b5-1 trading plan. The sale occurred shortly after the company reported Q3 2025 financial results that met analyst expectations, with an EPS of $0.09 and revenue of $104.2 million, driven by expansion in AI.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) authorizes $50M buyback; Q3 record revenue $104.2M
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. reported record third-quarter 2025 revenues of $104.2 million, an increase of 19.1% year-over-year, driven by strong AI demand and growth across its key verticals. The company's board of directors also authorized a $50.0 million share repurchase program, reflecting confidence in its long-term prospects. Grid Dynamics provided a positive financial outlook for Q4 2025 and the full year, anticipating continued growth and improved margins.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics outlines 300 bps margin expansion and $50M share repurchase amid record AI-driven revenue
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics announced a new strategy aimed at a 300 basis point expansion in non-GAAP adjusted operating margin to 15% and a $50 million share repurchase program. This comes as the company reports record AI-driven revenue, with AI and AI-related services growing to 35% of total revenue in Q4 2023. The company also provided a strong revenue outlook for Q1 2024, expecting 10-11% year-over-year growth to $85.5-$86.5 million.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:GDYN) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. reported Q3 2025 earnings where revenue reached an all-time high of $104.2 million, driven by AI demand constituting over 25% of organic revenue. The company announced a $50 million share repurchase program and expects to improve margins by at least 300 basis points over the next 12 months, leveraging AI-first initiatives and cost optimization. Discussions also focused on the accelerating adoption of Agentic AI solutions and a strong outlook for 2026 growth, supported by a higher billable headcount and longer-term client engagements.

feed.title: William Blair Investment Management LLC Acquires 67,781 Shares of Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. $GDYN
feed.summary: William Blair Investment Management LLC increased its stake in Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:GDYN) by 4.9% during the second quarter, acquiring an additional 67,781 shares. This acquisition brings their total holdings to 1,456,824 shares, valued at approximately $16.83 million. The company's stock has a market capitalization of $642.65 million, with 71.18% owned by institutional investors, and recently reported a 21.7% year-over-year increase in quarterly revenue and met EPS estimates.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. $GDYN Shares Sold by Vontobel Holding Ltd.
feed.summary: Vontobel Holding Ltd. significantly reduced its stake in Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. by 80.7%, selling over 61,000 shares. This move comes as Grid Dynamics reported a 21.7% year-over-year revenue increase, met EPS consensus, and maintains a "Moderate Buy" analyst consensus with an average target price of $14.80. Several other institutional investors also adjusted their holdings in the company.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. Experiences Revision in Stock Evaluation Amid Market Fluctuations
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics Holdings, Inc. has seen notable fluctuations in its stock price, with a trading range between $8.32 and $8.62, and a significant decline over the past year compared to the S&P 500. The company, a microcap player in the Computers - Software & Consulting industry, currently exhibits a mixed technical performance with some mildly bullish weekly indicators but overall bearish trends in the past year. This stark comparison with the S&P 500 highlights the need for strategic adjustments to maintain momentum in a competitive market.

feed.title: Next-Gen AI Agent Platform: Grid Dynamics and Temporal Launch Enterprise Solution for Thousands of AI Agents
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) and Temporal Technologies have launched an enterprise Agentic AI Platform designed to help businesses build, deploy, and manage thousands of advanced AI agents and workflows. This collaboration aims to address common enterprise AI challenges by providing enhanced reliability, fault tolerance, and observability for complex, long-running AI applications. The platform leverages Temporal's durable execution capabilities to accelerate AI adoption and automate intricate business processes.

feed.title: Analysts Offer Insights on Technology Companies: Grid Dynamics Holdings (GDYN), Western Digital (WDC) and Confluent (CFLT)
feed.summary: Three analysts from J.P. Morgan, TD Cowen, and other firms have issued bullish sentiments on technology companies Grid Dynamics Holdings (GDYN), Western Digital (WDC), and Confluent (CFLT). Price targets and consensus ratings suggest significant upsides for these stocks, encouraging investors to consider their potential.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Helps SmartRay Create an AI Robotic Inspection Platform in Collaboration with Wandelbots
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics has partnered with SmartRay, a leader in weld inspection, and Wandelbots to create an AI robotic inspection platform. This collaboration streamlines SmartRay's 3D weld inspection solution, JOSY, by leveraging AI for workpiece feasibility analysis and tool path generation, significantly reducing implementation time and operational costs. The platform, built on Wandelbots NOVA, provides seamless integration across various robotic manipulators, advancing next-generation robotics in manufacturing.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Releases Portal to Streamline Developer Experience and Boost Productivity
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics has launched an innovative developer portal designed to streamline the software development lifecycle, improve developer productivity, and reduce operational overheads. This self-service system centralizes access to essential development tools, environments, and processes, acting as a control center for development teams. The portal aims to accelerate development cycles and address the complexity faced by modern engineering teams.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Introduces Composable Commerce Starter Kit on Microsoft Azure, Enabling Rapid Replacement of Legacy Systems with Modern Digital Commerce Capabilities
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics has launched its Composable Commerce Starter Kit on Microsoft Azure, designed to help businesses rapidly replace legacy systems with modern digital commerce capabilities. This kit allows companies to deploy a minimum viable product (MVP) in months and leverage best-of-breed commerce components to build flexible, custom digital platforms. The solution, built on MACH architecture principles, integrates with commercetools and offers pre-built connectors for third-party ISVs, enabling businesses to enhance customer experiences and drive operational efficiency, according to Grid Dynamics and its partners.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics AWS Analytics Platform Starter Kit Leveraged by Client, Mistplay, to Improve Business Operations
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics successfully implemented its AWS Analytics Platform Starter Kit for Mistplay, a leading loyalty app for mobile gamers, enabling Mistplay to enhance its business operations. This solution helps Mistplay improve data sharing, gain valuable insights, and deploy advanced machine learning models for personalized game recommendations and increased user engagement. The turnkey platform was delivered in under five months, significantly accelerating Mistplay's AI and analytics initiatives and demonstrating Grid Dynamics' expertise in rapid cloud solution deployment.

feed.title: Grid Dynamics Launches Cutting Edge Mobile Digital Assistant for Banking
feed.summary: Grid Dynamics has launched a new mobile digital banking assistant solution that uses AI-driven conversational experiences to enhance customer banking. This innovation aims to address common frustrations with mobile banking interfaces by offering personalized interactions via voice, chat, or gestures. The solution integrates with existing bank technologies, enabling improved customer retention and competitiveness against fintechs and Big Tech.
